short_description: sali is an investment consultant & financial advisor based in austin, texas, united states.
long_description: founded in 2002, sali fund services, a jtc group company, provides a turn-key solution for the creation and administration of insurance dedicated funds (idfs). currently, sali administers 160+ idfs for a broad range of asset managers, from boutique hedge funds to the largest wealth management institutions in the world. sali enables investment managers to create tax compliant idfs which can be attached to insurance company private placement variable annuity (ppva) and private placement life insurance (ppli) investment account platforms. by leveraging sali to build and administer an insurance dedicated fund (idf), an asset manager is able to do what they do best â€“ manage money and deepen their client relationships. with 20+ years of experience, sali enables asset managers to create idfs with minimal expense and assures insurance companies that the ongoing administration will be managed in compliance with tax and regulatory requirements. ultra-affluent families often earmark a portion of their investment portfolio assets to create a legacy through charitable giving.

generated_description: sali fund services, legally known as sali fund services a jtc group company, was founded in 2002 and is based in austin, texas. the company provides a comprehensive solution for the creation and administration of insurance dedicated funds (idfs). sali administers over 160 idfs for a diverse range of asset managers, from boutique hedge funds to major wealth management institutions. the company enables investment managers to create tax-compliant idfs that can be attached to insurance company private placement variable annuity (ppva) and private placement life insurance (ppli) investment account platforms. sali serves as the fund administrator for these idfs, ensuring compliance with tax and regulatory requirements. the company's services are targeted at high net worth individuals, corporate-owned life insurance, insurance company-owned life insurance, bank-owned life insurance, and pensions, endowments, and foundations.
